title: Win7 SP1 x86-x64 (11in1) Activate [MULTi]

Technical Data:

Operating system: Windows 7 
Language: Multi and / or English / Spanish 
Format: ISO and / or Installer | Pack 

Description: 
------------- 
The following 35 languages ??including: Arabic Bulgarian Chinese-Simplified Chinese Hong Kong Crate, Chinese, Taiwanese 
Czech Danish Dutch English Estonian Finnish French German Greek Hebrew Hungarian Italian Japanese 
Korean Latvia Lithuania 
Norwegian Polish Portuguese-Brazil Portuguese-Portugal Romanian Russian Slovak Slovenian Serbian 
Spanish Swedish Thai Turkish and Ukrainian. 

Installing Languages: 

1. Go to Control Panel>> Clock Language and Region section. 
2. In the Regional and Language Options>> Keyboards and languages>> click Install or uninstall display languages. 
3. In the window that appears click Install Languages ??and specify the path to the desired location. 
Available architecture: x86 (32 bit) and x64 (64 bit) 
(Starter Home Basic Home Premium Ultimate Professional) 
BCD (ISO): 
WinPE x86 (for 32-bit operating system installation) and WinPE x64 (64-bit operating system installation) 
Memory Diagnostic Tool Windows

Operating System Installation 
Windows System Recovery 
Prompt

pad 
all the features available for both 32-bit architecture to 64 bits
